                               String xmlObject)
        Deserializes any object that has been serialized by the serializedObject(T) method
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of Object that was originally serialized
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class object representation of the object type
        xmlObject - The String for of the object to be deserialized
        Returns:
        The deserialized object
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        InstantiationException
        IllegalAccessException
